name: Orchestra Open Source
body:
# Orchestra Open Source

Orchestra Open Source is the organization behind a couple of 100% Open Source projects.
We are a new organizations, at the moment a one man organization.
All we want is to make good software that just works.

## Philosophy/Objectives:
* KISS - Keep It Simple Stupid.
* Less is More.
* Sacrifice features in order to have better performance and less bugs.

## Our software guidelines/rules are:
1. Keep the software and code as simple and small as possible.
2. Do not create/implement new features till you get all bugs fixed.
3. Test, test, test, test and test a new feature before making  a stable version, stable means stable! Stable is something that just works.
4. More guidelines to come.

## Current Projects:
* We just started a new project. It's called **Orchestra Browser**, [Orchestra Browser](https://github.com/OrchestraOpenSource/OrchestraBrowser)) is a fork of [Otter Browser](http://otter-browser.org/)). Otter Browser is a really neat [Open Source project](https://github.com/Emdek/otter)) that aims to implement the fantastic User Interface of Opera 12.x using Qt5 and it's all Open Source. So we want to help them. Opera was the most complete and fast browser ever. Problem is, it's closed source and now it's Chrome...
